sense.def:
To smother a fire
pomeni pokriti ogenj z nečim, tako da ugasne.

seg.quote: She grabbed a blanket to smother the flames.

sense.def:
To smother someone
pomeni ubiti nekoga tako, da ga pokrijemo čez obraz in ne more več dihati.

To smother someone
pomeni tudi nekomu izkazovati preveč ljubezni in varstva.

seg.quote: She should love them without smothering them with attention.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is smothered with things
, je popolnoma prekrito s stvarmi.

cit.quote: biti prekrit z, kopati se v

seg.quote: The pear tree was smothered in ivy.
